page.title: 15Strathmiglo's Bus Service
page.content: Not everyone in Strathmiglo has a car,so many people depend on public transport. There is one bus service which serves Strathmiglo and that is the one which links St Andrews - Stirling/Glasgow.Some of the nearest main towns are Perth, Glenrothes, Dundee and Kirkcaldy. There are no bus services to take people directly to these towns. Glenrothes is about ten miles away from Strathmiglo.You can get there by car in about 15 minutes.To get to Glenrothes by bus it is necessary to go first from Strathmiglo to Auchtermuchty to connect with the service between Perth and Kirkcaldy which passes through Glenrothes. The whole journey would take at least an hour.Local people are worried that the privitisation of bus services would mean an even poorer service for Strathmiglo.
